title: Biden’s Anti-Vaccine Days | Guests: Ben Shapiro & Robert Cahaly | 7/20/21
description:
Jeff Bezos finally made it to space, and Glenn and Stu catch it live to discuss. Glenn admits yoga knocks him out. Glenn and Stu discuss comedian Bo Burnham’s newest comedy special. Ben Shapiro joins to discuss the hit piece NPR published about the Daily Wire, exposing that it’s conservative. The Trafalgar Group released a new poll on how tired parents are of critical race theory in public schools, and chief pollster Robert Cahaly joins to break it down. Glenn takes a look at the real “misinformation” being spread, and it’s not coming from conservatives. Remember when Biden spread fear about the vaccines? How is Bill Burr not canceled yet?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
